content.raw:
I have some issues in linking time... Here is the linking error messages.

I am thinking, maybe this linking error was related with library naming convention, I am not sure but I think that 1.42 version use preffix -mt in the libraries and 1.53 doesn't. I have a system version (1.42 /usr/include, /usr/lib) and I have an experimental 1.53 (/usr/local)
content.html:
I have some issues in linking time... Here is the linking error messages.

I am thinking, maybe this linking error was related with library naming convention, I am not sure but I think that 1.42 version use preffix -mt in the libraries and 1.53 doesn't. I have a system version (1.42 /usr/include, /usr/lib) and I have an experimental 1.53 (/usr/local)
